description: Used to learn how to cook Sweet & Sour Pork.
bgDescription: A recipe that details how to make Sweet & Sour Pork.
obtainDescription: You can get the recipe for Sweet & Sour Pork after reaching level 4 in Windchimer Delivery. Level this up by looking for Windchimers scattered around Mt. Firmament! You can unlock Windchimer Delivery after completing Chapter 1: Act 7 of the main quest.
